text:
SparkUp | Paris / Remote | Full-time |

We are hiring RoR + AngularJS engineers to grow our dev team from 4 to 6 ASAP. We'll be 12 by the end of next year.

SparkUp builds marketing automation tools for equity fundraisings. We recently raised a seed round and are close to ramen profitability, growing at x2/quarter and expanding internationally, in Europe this quarter and the States in 2016.

Please contact jeremy@sparkup.fr (Cofounder) or florian@sparkup.fr (Lead Dev)

(We are also hiring interns)
